text: Surah Hud (, ), is the 11th surah of the Qur'an , the religious book of Muslims; There are 123 verses and 10 ruku's. Surah Hud has been revealed in Makkah . This surah speaks of the wrath (divine punishment) upon the previous nations and various kinds of severe torment (pre-determined punishment) and the terrible events of the Day of Resurrection and the rewards and punishments. == Other websites == *Q11:1, 50+ translations, islamawakened.com *Quran 11 Clear Quran translation *Surah Hud Mp4 * Hud == Reference ==
title: Surah Hud
